name: MoreFreelancerTargets
description: Adds more potential targets to the random pool used by Freelancer's Territory Takedown (AKA 'Mild') missions.

options.name: Paris Alerted Targets
options.tooltip: If enabled, Paris will always have Master Mode NPCs enabled, but extra targets will be available.

options.name: Marrakesh Alerted Targets
options.tooltip: If enabled, Marrakesh will always have Master Mode NPCs enabled, but extra targets will be available.

options.name: Bangkok Alerted Targets
options.tooltip: If enabled, Bangkok will always have Master Mode NPCs enabled, but extra targets will be available.

options.name: Hokkaido Alerted Targets
options.tooltip: If enabled, Hokkaido will always have Master Mode NPCs enabled, but extra targets will be available.
